name: Satellite Parking
description:
You play as RemoveDebris or R.D. for short. After an accident in space that resulted in a short circuit, your A.I. has gone haywire. Now instead of removing debris safely for all Mankind, your mission is to send as much fiery debris to Earth as possible to destroy all humans!

Created by:

David Kimball - Project Lead, Design, UI

Josh Miller - Programming

Adam Fatka - 3D Modeling and Design

Henry McGehee - Sound FX and Music

Jeremy Dandeneau - Concept Art, 2D/3D assets

For PC/MAC
